mapper.select:
select case when sslq='1' then '科技大楼' when sslq='2' then 'A栋' when sslq='3' then 'B栋' when sslq='4' then 'C栋' when sslq='5' then 'D栋' when sslq='6' then '琶洲科技创意中心' end Sslqname,ID,Hybh,Qymc,Qyzj,Glfwf,Qysf,Qydf,Ssyhd,Sbyhd,Shjyl,Dhjyl,Qymj,Hjje,Shzt,Fbzt,Jfyd,Dsyhd,Dbyhd,Zydy,Zjsq,Glfsq,Sfsq,Dfsq,Zjbz,Glfbz,Sfbz,Dfbz,Zlbzj,Zxyj,Glfwfdj,Qyzjdj,Zlbzjdj,Zxyjdj,Qyzjznj,Glfwfznj,Qysfznj,Zlbzjznj,Zxyjznj,Qydfznj,Hjjedx,Zlbzjsq,Zxyjsq,Zlbzjbz,Zxyjbz,Hjjeznj,Bz,Qydfdj,Qysfdj,Xxbz,Sslq,Ssyhd2,Sbyhd2,Shjyl2,Qysfdj2,Lqysf2,Sfbz2,Dsyhd2,Dbyhd2,Dhjyl2,Qydfdj2,Lqydf2,Dfbz2,Zjmc,Glfwfmc,Zlbzjmc,Zxyjmc,Sfmc,Dfmc,Lqysf,Lqydf ,Fpzl,Kpxm,Fkflx,Fkfsjhm,Fkfmc,Fkfzjlx,Fkfsbh,Fpje,Fz,Kpxmsm,Fpbz from member_rental where 1=1
and qymc like CONCAT('%', #{fhymc}, '%')
and Jfyd = #{fjfyd}
order by id desc
select * from member_rental where Hybh=#{hybh} and Jfyd=#{jfny}

select * from member_rental where Id in
#{item}
